1.1.8.en: Fixed a few bugs and optimized some flows

1.2.3.en: Fixed another few bugs and added some flows

1.2.5.en: Beter error handling, and added translations

1.2.7.en: Even beter error handling, and added logging module (see app settings)

1.2.9.en: Fixed an error in catching errors ;)

1.3.0.en: Fixed yet another error in catching errors ;)

1.3.1.en: Added trigger card for error state

1.3.2.en: Added error codes, and localiztion of settings and error messages

1.3.3.en: Solved a problem with multimap configurations. Enhanced some debug options.

1.3.4.en: Updated mrbungle64's Ecovacs-deebot library to version 0.9.3-beta.0

1.3.5.en: Change back the image token after fixes on the HP2023

1.4.1.en: Typo in one of the flow cards

1.4.5.en: Fixed a bug for systems without a moppng system, and some additional error catching

1.4.6.en: Removed saving of Cleanlog images to the filesystem

1.4.7.en: Changed the way Cleanlog images are handled

1.4.8.en: Changed the code so it can also run on Homey Cloud (docker)
